abstract: HSBC Holdings‘ investment banking chief said he sees a “significant opportunity” to boost revenue from hedge funds after the collapse of Lehman Brothers last year, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: HSBC Holdings‘ investment banking chief said he sees a “significant opportunity” to boost revenue from hedge funds after the collapse of Lehman Brothers last year, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: The investment banking chief of HSBC Holdings said he sees a “significant opportunity” to increase revenue from hedge funds after the collapse of Lehman Brothers last year, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: HSBC Banker Sees Opportunity With Hedge Funds
